data.title: Turkey live score, schedule & player stats
data.meta_description: Turkey live score, fixtures, player ratings and statistics.
data.text:
Turkey live scores, players, season schedule and today’s results are available on Sofascore.

Turkey next match

Turkey will play the next match against Ukraine on Oct 23, 2024, 5:00:00 PM UTC in Women's Euro, Qualification.

When the match starts, you will be able to follow Turkey vs Ukraine live score, standings, minute by minute updated live results and match statistics.

We may have video highlights with goals and news for some Turkey matches, but only if they play their match in one of the most popular football leagues.

Turkey previous match

Turkey previous match was against Hungary in Women's Euro, Qualification, the match ended with result 1 - 4 (Turkey won the match).

Turkey fixtures tab is showing the last 100 football matches with statistics and win/draw/lose icons.

There are also all Turkey scheduled matches that they are going to play in the future.

Turkey performance and form graph is a Sofascore unique algorithm that we are generating from the team's last 10 matches, statistics, detailed analysis and our own knowledge.

This graph may help predict future Turkey matches.

Current Turkey players

Forward: Aycan Yanaç, Melike Pekel, Başak Gündoğdu, Birgul Sadikoglu, Yağmur Uraz, Melike Öztürk, Zeynep Koçer, Kader Hançar, Zeynep Kerimoğlu, Busem Şeker, Neslihan Demirdöğen, Başak Içinözbebek, Beyza Kara, Benan Altintaş Midfielder: Miray Cin, Ebru Topçu, Ece Türkoğlu, Elif Keskin, İlayda Civelek, Seda Nur İncik, Gizem Gönültaş, Berivan İçen, Sevgi Çınar, Dilara Deli, Ecem Cumert, Arzu Karabulut, Ümran Özev, Derya Arhan, Meryem Cennet Çal, Emine Ecem Esen, Nur Yaren Özpolat, Tuğba Karataş, Fatma Kara, Dilan Ağgül, Fatoş Yıldırım, İrem Eren, Jessica O'Rourke, Cansu Gürel, Rojin Polat, Narin Yakut Defender: Didem Karagenç, Sejde Abrahamsson, İpek Kaya, Berna Yeniçeri, Eda Karatas, Esra Erol, Gulbin Hiz, Kezban Tag, Medine Erkan, Ebru Uzungüney, Yaşam Göksu, İlayda Kara, Selin Dişli, Büşra Kuru, Dilan Yeşim Taşkın, Cansu Nur Kaya Goalkeeper: Selda Akgöz, Gamze Yaman, Fatma Şahin, Ezgi Caglar, Göknur Güleryüz, Bedriye Cam, Handan Kurğa Unknown: Halle Sensizoglu

The current Turkey roster, stats and player performance can be found on this page.

There are also statistics for each player in all competitions with all total played and started matches, minutes played, number of goals scored, number of cards and much more.

Turkey top scorers list is updated live during every match.

You can click on players from the roster above and see available personal information such as nationality, date of birth, height, preferred foot, position, player value, transfer history etc.
